explanation: [0-0] A half-open yellow wooden door, with a round metal object on the left side and a metal hinge visible on the right. In the upper left corner of the screen, there's a green logo with the words "SIMPLE MOTIONS" in white.

[0-2] Then the door closes forward, revealing a complex metal lock on the left side with gears and other mechanical components. As the door closes, the gear at the bottom of the lock starts to rotate left.

[2-6] Following this, the gear at the bottom of the lock turns left, the gear at the top turns right, the slider at the bottom of the lock moves to the right, and the door is locked.
